name: Space Capitalist!!!
description:
Your goal as Geoff Bozos, is to get a foothold on this new planet to pave the way into a developers fortune!

If you let the inhabitants rob you of your money, you will find yourself escaping with nothing but the shirt on your back!

The more trouble the inhabitants give you the less investors will believe in your idea! Once your out of money your development is over.

Survive  in this top down tower defense game, by gathering resources and building a path lined with defenses made from them.

Displace all of the inhabitants to turn this planet into a money making machine!

Studio: GLHF Games
Developers: 

  • Game Designer: Harrison Black 
  • Lead Software Engineer: Julian Sangiorgio  
  • UI/Audio Engineer: Justin Dela Cruz     
  • Gameplay Programmer: Joaquin Ruiz   
  • Game Producer/General Programmer: Mandip Minhas
